title: Court sides strikes down California law on election-related AI deepfakes
description: The AI deepfakes law came as there's been increased concerns about the quick advancement of artificial intelligence and its impacts on political candidates.
content:
A federal judge ruled in favor of billionaire Elon Musk and his X social media platform in their challenge to a California law that banned AI-generated, deepfake content related to elections.

title: Cohere's agentic AI platform North gets wide release, aims to handle 'boring' work
description: Cohere is making its agentic artificial intelligence platform more widely available. The Toronto-based tech firm announced Wednesday that its North platform, which was launched in a limited fashion in January, is getting a broader release.

title: Karl Deeter’s EI-backed software business acquired for €9m
description: Mortgage broker Karl Deeter sold his business Artificial Intelligence Finance to London-listen Software Circle in a deal valued up to €9m.
content:
Deeter will continue to remain with the company, leading AIF’s day-to-day business.
Mortgage broker Karl Deeter has sold his business Artificial Intelligence Finance (AIF) to London-listen Software Circle in a deal valued up to €9m.

title: Digital literacy, intersectoral action key to successful fraud prevention in PH
description: WHAT began as simple phishing emails has evolved into a complex network of online schemes that leave many pockets dry. Powered by both cutting-edge artificial intelligence (AI) deepfakes and forged IDs, digital fraud is more challenging to battle against despite financial technology’s undeniable convenience.
